H0.text: Which previously independent country, an archipelago in the Indian Ocean, 2550 km (1530 miles) off the coast of Africa, united with Tanganyika to form Tanzania in 1964. Zanzibar

H1.text: Which previously independent country, an archipelago in the Indian Ocean, 2550 km (1530 miles) off the coast of Africa, united with Tanganyika to form Tanzania in 1964. Madagascar

H2.text: Which previously independent country, an archipelago in the Indian Ocean, 2550 km (1530 miles) off the coast of Africa, united with Tanganyika to form Tanzania in 1964. Seychelles

H3.text: Which previously independent country, an archipelago in the Indian Ocean, 2550 km (1530 miles) off the coast of Africa, united with Tanganyika to form Tanzania in 1964. Kidichi

A4.text: Zanzibar united with Tanganyika in 1964 to form the present-day United Republic of Tanzania.

A5.text: Zanzibar is a Tanzanian archipelago off the coast of East Africa.
